short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay mindful and productive while browsing. Get reminders to take breaks, stand up, and drink water.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience a new level of productivity with CodeNap. Seamlessly integrated into your browsing experience, this extension gently reminds you to take breaks, stand up, and hydrate, helping you maintain focus and well-being throughout your day.
